ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD takes a bite out of Spider-Man 3, and spoofs Dog the Bounty Hunter and Law and Order: SVU! MAD also pokes fun at 1 vs 100, spelling bees, 5th graders and mallrats. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Monroe, Planet Tad, the Fold-In and much more!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:09:15. [Issue ID 129319]
